condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Select the OS for Experion HS Server Node)*>,Windows 10 ENT 2019),[EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Redundant Servers)*>,Yes),[EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Select the OS for Exp HS Flex Station Node)*>,Windows 10 ENT 2019),[GT](<* IsNull(<*VALUE(Exp HS Quantity of Flex Station)*>,0)*>,0))
name: MS-OSLW19 Set3
action:
<* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Experion_HS_PART_SUMMARY:MS-OSLW19)*>
<*SETATVQTY(Experion_HS_PART_SUMMARY:MS-OSLW19,<*Eval(2+ <*VALUE(Exp HS Quantity of Flex Station)*>)*>)*><* DoResetAtt *>
description:
CXCPQ-45837 Condition 2 - If "Select the OS for Experion HS Server Node"  = Windows 10 ENT 2019 AND "Redundant Server" = Yes 
Then Qty = 2 + If "Select the OS for Experion HS Flex Station Node" = Windows 10 ENT 2019 then add value entered by user for "Quantity of Flex Station"
